Uses of Class
fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.builder.FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder

  • Packages that use FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder 
    Package Description
    fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.builder  

    • Uses of FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder in fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.builder

      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.builder that return FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.addSharedVariable(String name, Object value)
      Adds shared variable to the configuration; It uses Configurable.getObjectWrapper() to wrap the value, so it's important that the object wrapper is set before this.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.addSharedVariable(String name, freemarker.template.TemplateModel tm)
      Adds a shared variable to the configuration.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.addSharedVariables(freemarker.template.TemplateHashModelEx variables)
      Adds all object in the hash as shared variable to the configuration; it's like doing several addSharedVariable(String, Object) calls, one for each hash entry.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.base(freemarker.template.Configuration base)
      Sets the base configuration that will be configured.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<MYSELF> AbstractFreemarkerBuilder.configuration()
      Fluent configurer for Freemarker configuration.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.defaultEncoding(String charsetName)
      * Sets the charset used for decoding byte sequences to character sequences when reading template files in a locale for which no explicit encoding was specified via Configuration.setEncoding(Locale, String).
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.enableStaticMethodAccess(Boolean enable)
      Enable calls to static methods from templates:
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.staticMethodAccessVariableName(String variableName)
      Change the name of the variable used to access static methods.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.templateExceptionHandler(freemarker.template.TemplateExceptionHandler exceptionHandler)
      Sets the exception handler used to handle exceptions occurring inside templates.
      FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.version(freemarker.template.Version version)
      Sets which of the non-backward-compatible bugfixes/improvements should be enabled.
      Methods in fr.sii.ogham.template.freemarker.builder that return types with arguments of type FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      ConfigurationValueBuilder<FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P>,Boolean> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.enableStaticMethodAccess()
      Enable calls to static methods from templates:
      ConfigurationValueBuilder<FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder<P>,String> FreemarkerConfigurationBuilder.staticMethodAccessVariableName()
      Change the name of the variable used to access static methods.
